EmailTemplate.name: Timesheet Email
EmailTemplate.subject: It's time to complete your daily report.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
It's time to complete your daily report. Please, answer honestly and provide additional details if possible.
Complete the report! https://empathetic-koala-7aqdaz-dev-ed.trailblaze.my.salesforce-sites.com/timesheet/ReportForm?md5Token={!Contact.MD5_Token__c}
Sincerely, Your HR Team
